Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook t=
hem for escaping alliance members. he mentally reported his actions to Ice =
and got the go ahead. He chased the three until they were out of the way of=
 the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted t=
hem. "You will stop or you will be forced to, your choice."

He aproached t=
he three bots ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacef=
ully.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
  Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
  Subject: Eclipse, Wolver=
itron, and Ramus


  ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
   
      They had heard=
 the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the conflict.=
 Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther t=
hey exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.
